home.title: Night Mode: Global Night Community
home.subtitle: Profiles, unique QR merch, and gamified competitions in one MVP.

story.title: Brand story
story.p1: Night Mode started as a local capsule for ravers and club culture.
story.p2: Now the brand mission is to connect cities and scenes through one map.
story.p3: Every item receives a unique QR permanently linked to the owner profile.

map.title: Global map
map.subtitle: Add your points, filter countries and open member profiles.

competitions.title: Competitions
competitions.subtitle: Weekly city ranking by merch and personal clicker challenge.

qr.title: QR and merch binding
qr.subtitle: Scan via browser camera and bind items to your profile.
